SEARCH
Package org.team21.game.controllers

Class IssueOrderController

java.lang.Object
org.team21.game.controllers.IssueOrderController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameFlowManager
public class IssueOrderController extends Object implements GameFlowManager
Manages the Issue Order phase of the game. Responsible for player turns, command input, validation, and transitioning to the next game phase.
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Kapil Soni
